text:
NAEB RIGHTS vs. CENTER RIGHTS
Jeffersonian Heritage: We have radio rights and one-time transcription
rights. Have copyrights to scripts but not
publication rights. Royalties go to authors.
Jeffersonian Heritage script done on television
belongs to the Center.
Ways of Mankind: NAEB owns radio, ET, TV, and film rights.
We are giving TV and film rights to the Center.
People under Communism: Same as Jeffersonian Heritage.
Voices of Europe; We own all rights. Glad to transfer to Center.
